df-txp
blocks.content: Define the tail cross of two classes. Membership in this class is defined by ~ txpss3v and ~ brtxp . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)

blocks.name: df-pprod
blocks.content: Define the parallel product of two classes. Membership in this class is defined by ~ pprodss4v and ~ brpprod . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: df-sset
blocks.content: Define the subset class. For the value, see ~ brsset . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)

blocks.name: df-trans
blocks.content: Define the class of all transitive sets. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)

blocks.name: df-bigcup
blocks.content: Define the Bigcup function, which, per ~ fvbigcup , carries a set to its union. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: df-fix
blocks.content: Define the class of all fixpoints of a relationship. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: df-limits
blocks.content: Define the class of all limit ordinals. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: df-funs
blocks.content: Define the class of all functions. See ~ elfuns for membership. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Feb-2013.)

blocks.name: df-singleton
blocks.content: Define the singleton function. See ~ brsingle for its value. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: df-singles
blocks.content: Define the class of all singletons. See ~ elsingles for membership. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2013.)

blocks.name: df-image
blocks.content: Define the image functor. This function takes a set ` A ` to a function ` x |-> ( A " x ) ` , providing that the latter exists. See ~ imageval for the derivation. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: df-cart
blocks.content: Define the cartesian product function. See ~ brcart for its value. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: df-img

blocks.content: Define the domain function. See ~ brdomain for its value. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: df-range
blocks.content: Define the range function. See ~ brrange for its value. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: df-cup

blocks.name: df-cap

blocks.name: df-restrict

blocks.name: df-apply

blocks.name: df-funpart
blocks.content: Define the functional part of a class ` F ` . This is the maximal part of ` F ` that is a function. See ~ funpartfun and ~ funpartfv for the meaning of this statement. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: df-fullfun
blocks.content: Define the full function over ` F ` . This is a function with domain ` _V ` that always agrees with ` F ` for its value. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: df-lb

blocks.name: txpss3v
blocks.content: A tail Cartesian product is a subset of the class of ordered triples. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm txpss3v(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(ctxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
} = {
  eqsstri(ctxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)), cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c1)))
  df-txp(c0, c1)
  sstri(cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c1)), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)), ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0))
  inss1(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c1))
  relssi(hs0, hs1, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
  relco(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0)
  3imtr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  exlimiv(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  adantl(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)), wbr(cv(hs1), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs2)))
  brcnv(cv(hs2), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs1))
  simplbi(wbr(cv(hs1), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1st, cv(hs2)))
  brresi(cv(hs1), c1st, cxp(universe, universe), cv(hs2))
  vex(hs2)
  opelco(hs2, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0)
  vex(hs1)
  mpbiran(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe))), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  opelxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), universe, cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
  diff.hs1.c(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm txpss3v(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0(×)c1)⊆(𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌))
} = {
  eqsstri((c0(×)c1), (𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)), ((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0)⋂(`'(2nd |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c1)))
  df-txp(c0, c1)
  sstri(((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0)⋂(`'(2nd |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c1)), (𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)), (`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0))
  inss1((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0), (`'(2nd |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c1))
  relssi(hs0, hs1, (`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0), (𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  relco(`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)), c0)
  3imtr4i(< hs0, hs1 > ∈(`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0), < hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)), ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs1)), hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  exlimiv(hs2, (hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs1), hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  adantl(hs0[c0]hs2, hs2[`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs1, hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylbi(hs2[`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs1, hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), hs1[(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs2)
  brcnv(hs2, (1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)), hs1)
  simplbi(hs1[(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs2, hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), hs1[1st]hs2)
  brresi(hs1, c1st, (𝕌 × 𝕌), hs2)
  vex(hs2)
  opelco(hs2, hs0, hs1, `'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)), c0)
  vex(hs1)
  mpbiran(< hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)), hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  opelxp(hs0, hs1, universe, (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0))
  diff.hs0.c((𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  diff.hs1.c((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0))
  diff.hs1.c((𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  diff.hs2.w(hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: txprel
blocks.content: A tail Cartesian product is a relationship. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)

blocks.name: brtxp
blocks.content: Characterize a ternary relation over a tail Cartesian product. Together with ~ txpss3v , this completely defines membership in a tail cross. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm brtxp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, ctxp(c1, c2), cop(c3, c4)), wa(wbr(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c0, c2, c4)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wcel(c4, universe)
} = {
  3bitri(wbr(c0, ctxp(c1, c2), cop(c3, c4)), wa(wbr(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c0, c2, c4)), wbr(c0, cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c1), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c2)), cop(c3, c4)), wa(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c1), cop(c3, c4)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c2), cop(c3, c4))))
  breqi(c0, ctxp(c1, c2), cop(c3, c4), cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c1), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c2)))
  df-txp(c1, c2)
  brin(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c1), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c2), cop(c3, c4))
  anbi12i(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c1), cop(c3, c4)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c2), cop(c3, c4)), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c0, c2, c4))
  3bitri(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c1), cop(c3, c4)), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c3, c4)))), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))))
  brco(hs0, c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c1, cop(c3, c4))
  exbii(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c3, c4))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))))
  anbi1ci(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c3, c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  3bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c3, c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wbr(cop(c3, c4), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cop(c3, c4), c1st, cv(hs0)))
  brcnv(cv(hs0), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cop(c3, c4))
  mpbiran(wbr(cop(c3, c4), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cop(c3, c4), c1st, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(c3, c4), cxp(universe, universe)))
  brresi(cop(c3, c4), c1st, cxp(universe, universe), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  br1steq(c3, c4, cv(hs0))
  ceqsexv(hs0, c3, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c3, c0, c1)
  3bitri(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c2), cop(c3, c4)), wbr(c0, c2, c4), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c3, c4)))), wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs1)))))
  brco(hs1, c0, ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c2, cop(c3, c4))
  exbii(hs1, wa(wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c3, c4))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs1))))
  anbi1ci(wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c3, c4)), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))
  3bitri(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c3, c4)), wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wbr(cop(c3, c4), cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cop(c3, c4), c2nd, cv(hs1)))
  brcnv(cv(hs1), cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), cop(c3, c4))
  opex(c3, c4)
  mpbiran(wbr(cop(c3, c4), cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cop(c3, c4), c2nd, cv(hs1)), wcel(cop(c3, c4), cxp(universe, universe)))
  opelvv(c3, c4)
  brresi(cop(c3, c4), c2nd, cxp(universe, universe), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  br2ndeq(c3, c4, cv(hs1))
  ceqsexv(hs1, c4, wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, c2, c4))
  breq2(cv(hs1), c4, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cop(c3, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cop(c3, c4))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(c0, c2, c4))
}

blocks.name: brtxp2
blocks.content: The binary relation over a tail cross when the second argument is not an ordered pair. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm brtxp2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, ctxp(c1, c2), c3), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(c3, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s1))))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  3bitri(wbr(c0, ctxp(c1, c2), c3), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(c3, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c3, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, ctxp(c1, c2), c3)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c3, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, ctxp(c1, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))

  a1ii(wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, c3, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c4, universe))

  bitr4i(wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4)))), wa(wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4)))
  pm4.71ri(wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  sylib(wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(c4, cxp(universe, universe)))
  simprd(wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4), wcel(c4, cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  brel(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4, cxp(universe, universe), cxp(universe, universe))
  pprodss4v(c2, c3)
  elvv(s0, s1, c4)
  19.41vv(s0, s1, wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4))
  2exbii(s0, s1, wa(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4)), wa(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  pm5.32i(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), c4), wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  breq2(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3))

  bitr4i(wa(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cop(c0, c1), cpprod(c2, c3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), w3a(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, c3, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, c3, cv(s1)))))

  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)

thm brpprod3b(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  bitri(wbr(c0, ccnv(cpprod(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c2))), cop(c3, c4)), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c3, ccnv(c1), cv(s0)), wbr(c4, ccnv(c2), cv(s1))))), wbr(cop(c3, c4), cpprod(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c2)), c0))
  brcnv(c0, cpprod(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c2)), cop(c3, c4))
  opex(c3, c4)
  brpprod3a(s0, s1, c3, c4, ccnv(c1), ccnv(c2), c0)
  2exbii(s0, s1, w3a(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c3, ccnv(c1), cv(s0)), wbr(c4, ccnv(c2), cv(s1))), w3a(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3), wbr(cv(s1), c2, c4)))
  3anbi123i(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c3, ccnv(c1), cv(s0)), wbr(c4, ccnv(c2), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3), wbr(cv(s1), c2, c4))

blocks.name: brsset

  3bitr4i(wbr(cv(hs0), csset, c1), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep))))), wal(hs1, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))
  con1bii(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep)))), wal(hs1, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))
  3bitrri(wn(wal(hs1, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep)))), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs1), ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep)), cop(cv(hs0), c1))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))))
  elrn(hs1, cop(cv(hs0), c1), ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep)))
  opex(cv(hs0), c1)
  exbii(hs1, wbr(cv(hs1), ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep)), cop(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))
  bitri(wbr(cv(hs1), ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep)), cop(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), wa(wbr(cv(hs1), cep, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cdif(universe, cep), c1)))

  brv(cv(hs1), c1)

  epeli(cv(hs1), c1)
  exanali(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), csset, c1), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep))))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), csset))
  df-br(cv(hs0), csset, c1)
  bitri(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), csset), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep))))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep))))))
  eleq2i(cop(cv(hs0), c1), csset, cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep)))))
  df-sset()
  mpbiran(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep))))), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep))))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌

  brrelex1i(c0, csset, c1)

  con1bii(wbr(c0, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe))), c2), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c0))))
  3bitrri(wn(wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c0)))), wbr(c0, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe))), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe)))), wex(s0, wn(wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c0)))))
  df-br(c0, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe))), c2)
  bitri(wcel(cop(c0, c2), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe)))), wex(s0, wn(wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c0)))), wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe)), cop(c0, c2))))
  elrn(s0, cop(c0, c2), csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe)))
  opex(c0, c2)
  exbii(s0, wbr(cv(s0), csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe)), cop(c0, c2)), wn(wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c0))))
  xchbinx(wbr(cv(s0), csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe)), cop(c0, c2)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c0)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), ctxp(universe, cep), cop(c0, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), ctxp(c1, universe), cop(c0, c2))))
  brsymdif(cv(s0), ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe), cop(c0, c2))
  bibi12i(wbr(cv(s0), ctxp(universe, cep), cop(c0, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), ctxp(c1, universe), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c0))
  bitri(wbr(cv(s0), ctxp(universe, cep), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), cep, c2))
  mpbiran(wbr(cv(s0), ctxp(universe, cep), cop(c0, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), cep, c2), wbr(cv(s0), universe, c0))
  brv(cv(s0), c0)
  brtxp(cv(s0), universe, cep, c0, c2)
  epeli(cv(s0), c2)

  brv(cv(s0), c2)
  brtxp(cv(s0), c1, universe, c0, c2)
  vex(s0)
  exnal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c0)))
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.csymdif.s(s0, ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c1, universe))
  diff.ctxp.s(s0, universe, cep)

blocks.name: brtxpsd2
blocks.content: Another common abbreviation for quantifier-free definitions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm brtxpsd2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wceq(c1, cdif(c4, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c3, universe)))))
  -| wbr(c0, c4, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitri(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0))), wn(wbr(c0, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c3, universe))), c2)))
  mpbiran(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wn(wbr(c0, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c3, universe))), c2)), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  bitri(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wn(wbr(c0, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c3, universe))), c2))), wbr(c0, cdif(c4, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c3, universe)))), c2))
  breqi(c0, c1, c2, cdif(c4, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c3, universe)))))
  brdif(c0, c4, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c3, universe))), c2)
  brtxpsd(s0, c0, c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: brtxpsd3
blocks.content: A third common abbreviation for quantifier-free definitions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm brtxpsd3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wceq(c1, cdif(c4, crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(c5, universe)))))
  -| wbr(c0, c4, c2)
  -| wb(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c2, c3), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c0))))
  albii(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c0)))
  bibi2i(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c0))
  dfcleq(s0, c2, c3)
  brtxpsd2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c5, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brtxpsd3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (c0[c1]c2 ↔ c2 = c3)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 =(c4 \ ran(((𝕌(×)∈)∆(c5(×)𝕌))))
  ⊣ c0[c4]c2
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c3 ↔ s0[c5]c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(c0[c1]c2, c2 = c3, ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ c2 ↔ s0 ∈ c3)), ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ c2 ↔ s0[c5]c0)))
  albii(s0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↔ s0 ∈ c3), (s0 ∈ c2 ↔ s0[c5]c0))
  bibi2i(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c3, s0[c5]c0)
  dfcleq(s0, c2, c3)
  brtxpsd2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c5, c4)
}

thm brbigcup(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cbigcup, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), c1))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wbr(c0, cbigcup, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), c1), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cbigcup, c1)
  relbigcup()
  sylibr(wceq(cuni(c0), c1), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  mpbiri(wceq(cuni(c0), c1), wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  eleq1(cuni(c0), c1, universe)
  uniexb(c0)
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, universe, wbr(c0, cbigcup, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cbigcup, c1), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, cbigcup, c1)
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), cbigcup, c1), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(hs0))))
  brtxpsd3(hs1, cv(hs0), cbigcup, c1, cuni(cv(hs0)), cxp(universe, universe), ccom(cep, cep))
  df-bigcup()
  mpbir2an(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  brxp(cv(hs0), universe, universe, c1)
  3bitr4ri(wcel(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs1), ccom(cep, cep), cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(hs1), cep, cv(hs2))), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  rexbii(hs2, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(hs1), cep, cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  epel(hs2, cv(hs1))
  coep(hs2, cv(hs1), cep, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  eluni2(hs2, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  eqcom(c1, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cbigcup, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cuni(c0), c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(ccom(cep, cep))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(cep)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm brbigcup(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[Bigcup]c1 ↔ ⋃ c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0[Bigcup]c1, ⋃ c0 = c1, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1i(c0, cbigcup, c1)
  relbigcup()
  sylibr(⋃ c0 = c1, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpbiri(⋃ c0 = c1, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  eleq1(⋃ c0, c1, universe)
  uniexb(c0)
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, universe, c0[Bigcup]c1, ⋃ c0 = c1, hs0[Bigcup]c1, ⋃ hs0 = c1)
  breq1(hs0, c0, cbigcup, c1)
  eqeq1d(⋃ hs0, c1, ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  bitri(hs0[Bigcup]c1, ⋃ hs0 = c1, c1 = ⋃ hs0)
  brtxpsd3(hs1, hs0, cbigcup, c1, ⋃ hs0, (𝕌 × 𝕌), (∈ ∘ ∈))
  df-bigcup()
  mpbir2an(hs0[(𝕌 × 𝕌)]c1, hs0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  brxp(hs0, universe, universe, c1)
  3bitr4ri(hs1 ∈ ⋃ hs0, hs1[(∈ ∘ ∈)]hs0, ∃(hs2 ∈ hs0, hs1[∈]hs2), ∃(hs2 ∈ hs0, hs1 ∈ hs2))
  rexbii(hs2, hs0, hs1[∈]hs2, hs1 ∈ hs2)
  epel(hs2, hs1)
  coep(hs2, hs1, cep, hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  eluni2(hs2, hs1, hs0)
  eqcom(c1, ⋃ hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[Bigcup]c1)

  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃ hs0)

  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(cep)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
}

thm dfbigcup2(setvar s0) {

} = {

  eqcom(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))
  brbigcup(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  brab(s0, hs2, cv(hs0), cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wceq(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(hs0))))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), universe), wceq(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wceq(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(hs0))))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, universe)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  unieq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs2.c(cuni(cv(s0)))
}

thm dfbigcup2(setvar s0) {
  ⊢ Bigcup =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃ s0)
} = {
  eqbrriv(hs0, hs1, cbigcup, (s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃ s0))

thm fobigcup() {
  |- wfo(cbigcup, universe, universe)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wfo(cbigcup, universe, universe), wfn(cbigcup, universe), wceq(crn(cbigcup), universe))
  mpbi(wfn(cbigcup, universe), wral(hs0, universe, wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), universe)))
  rgen(hs0, universe, wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), universe))
  uniexg(cv(hs0), universe)
  mptfng(hs0, universe, cuni(cv(hs0)), cbigcup)
  eqtr4i(crn(cbigcup), universe, cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, universe, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))))))
  rnmpt(hs1, hs0, cbigcup, universe, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  dfbigcup2(hs0)
  abbi2i(hs1, universe, wrex(hs0, universe, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  2th(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wrex(hs0, universe, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  mp2an(wrex(hs0, universe, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(csn(cv(hs1)), universe), wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(csn(cv(hs1)))))
  snex(cv(hs1))
  eqcomi(cv(hs1), cuni(csn(cv(hs1))))
  unisn(cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  rspceeqv(hs0, csn(cv(hs1)), universe, cv(hs1), cuni(csn(cv(hs1))), cuni(cv(hs0)))
  unieq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1)))
  df-fo(cbigcup, universe, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(csn(cv(hs1))))
}

thm fobigcup() {
  ⊢ (Bigcup : 𝕌 ↠ 𝕌)
} = {
  mpbir2an((Bigcup : 𝕌 ↠ 𝕌), Bigcup[Fn]𝕌, ran(Bigcup)= 𝕌)
  mpbi(Bigcup[Fn]𝕌, ∀(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ hs0 ∈ 𝕌))

  rnmpt(hs1, hs0, cbigcup, universe, ⋃ hs0)

  snex(hs1)
  eqcomi(hs1, ⋃ { hs1 })
  unisn(hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  rspceeqv(hs0, { hs1 }, universe, hs1, ⋃ { hs1 }, ⋃ hs0)

  df-fo(cbigcup, universe, universe)

thm elfix(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfix(c1)), wbr(c0, c1, c0))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cfix(c1)), wbr(c0, c1, c0), wcel(c0, cdm(cin(c1, cid))), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))))

  syl((Rel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 ∈(= ∘ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c1), ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2, hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >)))
  elrel(hs1, hs2, c0, hs0)
  exlimivv(hs1, hs2, hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, (hs0 ∈(= ∘ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c1))
  3bitr4d(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, hs0 ∈(= ∘ c1), hs0 ∈ c1, hs1[(= ∘ c1)]hs2, hs1[c1]hs2)

  ideq(hs0, hs2)
  ceqsexv(hs0, hs2, hs1[c1]hs0, hs1[c1]hs2)
  vex(hs2)

  syl6bbr(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, hs0 ∈(= ∘ c1), hs1[(= ∘ c1)]hs2, < hs1, hs2 > ∈(= ∘ c1))
  eleq1(hs0, < hs1, hs2 >, (= ∘ c1))
  df-br(hs1, (= ∘ c1), hs2)
  syl6bbr(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1[c1]hs2, < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c1)
  eleq1(hs0, < hs1, hs2 >, c1)
  df-br(hs1, c1, hs2)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, (= ∘ c1))
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(Rel(c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w((hs0 ∈(= ∘ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c1))
  diff.hs2.w((hs0 ∈(= ∘ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cid)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(hs2)
  diff.hs0.w(hs1[c1]hs2)

blocks.name: dffun10
blocks.content: Another potential definition of functionhood. Based on statements in ~ http://people.math.gatech.edu/~~belinfan/research/autoreas/otter/sum/fs/ . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 30-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffun10(class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(c0), wss(c0, ccom(cid, cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wfun(c0), wss(c0, ccom(cid, cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))), wa(wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))), wa(wrel(c0), wss(c0, cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))))
  pm5.32i(wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), wss(c0, cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0))))
  syl6rbbr(wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), wss(c0, cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))))))
  ssrel(hs0, hs1, c0, cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))
  2albii(hs0, hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))))
  3bitri(wal(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))), wal(hs2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wal(hs2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))
  albii(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  impexp(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  19.21v(hs2, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  imbi2i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wal(hs2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0))))
  bitr4i(wal(hs2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0))), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0))))
  con2bii(wal(hs2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))
  3bitri(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)), wn(wal(hs2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), cdif(universe, cid), cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wn(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))
  opelco(hs2, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cdif(universe, cid), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  exbii(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), cdif(universe, cid), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wn(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), cdif(universe, cid), cv(hs1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wn(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  df-br(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))
  xchbinx(wbr(cv(hs2), cdif(universe, cid), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), cid, cv(hs1)))
  mpbiran(wbr(cv(hs2), cdif(universe, cid), cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs2), cid, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), universe, cv(hs1)))
  brv(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))
  brdif(cv(hs2), universe, cid, cv(hs1))
  bitri(wbr(cv(hs2), cid, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  ideq(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  equcom(hs2, hs1)
  exanali(hs2, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  mpbiran(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0))), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), universe))
  opex(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  eldif(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0))
  dffun4(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  sscoid(c0, cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(universe, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c0)))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(cdif(universe, cid))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
}

thm dffun10(class c0) {
  ⊢ (Fun(c0)↔ c0 ⊆(= ∘(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0))))
} = {
  3bitr4i(Fun(c0), c0 ⊆(= ∘(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0))), (Rel(c0)∧ ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∀(hs2,((< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 ∧ < hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0)→ hs1 = hs2))))), (Rel(c0)∧ c0 ⊆(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0))))
  pm5.32i(Rel(c0), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∀(hs2,((< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 ∧ < hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0)→ hs1 = hs2)))), c0 ⊆(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0)))
  syl6rbbr(Rel(c0), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∀(hs2,((< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 ∧ < hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0)→ hs1 = hs2)))), c0 ⊆(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0)), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 → < hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0))))))
  ssrel(hs0, hs1, c0, (𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0)))
  2albii(hs0, hs1, ∀(hs2,((< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 ∧ < hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0)→ hs1 = hs2)), (< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 → < hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0))))
  3bitri(∀(hs2,((< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 ∧ < hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0)→ hs1 = hs2)), (< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 → < hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0))), ∀(hs2,(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 →(< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs1 = hs2))), (< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 → ∀(hs2,(< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs1 = hs2))))
  albii(hs2, ((< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 ∧ < hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0)→ hs1 = hs2), (< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 →(< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs1 = hs2)))
  impexp(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, < hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0, hs1 = hs2)
  19.21v(hs2, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, (< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs1 = hs2))
  imbi2i(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, ∀(hs2,(< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs1 = hs2)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0)))
  bitr4i(∀(hs2,(< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs1 = hs2)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0)), ¬ < hs0, hs1 > ∈((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0))
  con2bii(∀(hs2,(< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs1 = hs2)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0))
  3bitri(< hs0, hs1 > ∈((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0), ¬ ∀(hs2,(< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs1 = hs2)), ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[(𝕌 \ =)]hs1)), ∃(hs2,(< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs1 = hs2)))
  opelco(hs2, hs0, hs1, (𝕌 \ =), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  exbii(hs2, (hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[(𝕌 \ =)]hs1), (< hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs1 = hs2))
  anbi12i(hs0[c0]hs2, hs2[(𝕌 \ =)]hs1, < hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0, ¬ hs1 = hs2)
  df-br(hs0, c0, hs2)
  xchbinx(hs2[(𝕌 \ =)]hs1, hs1 = hs2, hs2[=]hs1)
  mpbiran(hs2[(𝕌 \ =)]hs1, ¬ hs2[=]hs1, hs2[𝕌]hs1)
  brv(hs2, hs1)
  brdif(hs2, universe, cid, hs1)
  bitri(hs2[=]hs1, hs1 = hs2, hs2 = hs1)
  ideq(hs2, hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  equcom(hs2, hs1)
  exanali(hs2, < hs0, hs2 > ∈ c0, hs1 = hs2)
  mpbiran(< hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0)), ¬ < hs0, hs1 > ∈((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ 𝕌)
  opex(hs0, hs1)
  eldif(< hs0, hs1 >, universe, ((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0))
  dffun4(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  sscoid(c0, (𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((𝕌 \((𝕌 \ =)∘ c0)))
  diff.hs2.w(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c((𝕌 \ =))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
}

blocks.name: elfuns
blocks.content: Membership in the class of all functions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Feb-2013.)

thm elfuns(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfuns), wfun(c0))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(wcel(c0, cfuns), wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))), wa(wrel(c0), wn(wex(hs3, wex(hs4, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3))))))))
  pm5.32i(wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), wn(wex(hs3, wex(hs4, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3)))))))
  con2bid(wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), wex(hs3, wex(hs4, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3))))))
  syl6bb(wrel(c0), wex(hs3, wex(hs4, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3))))), wn(wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))), wex(hs3, wex(hs4, wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wex(hs5, wex(hs2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs4), cop(cv(hs5), cv(hs2)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3)))))))))))
  2exbidv(hs3, hs4, wrel(c0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3))), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wex(hs5, wex(hs2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs4), cop(cv(hs5), cv(hs2)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3)))))))))
  syl6bb(wrel(c0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3))), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wex(hs5, wex(hs2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs4), cop(cv(hs5), cv(hs2)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3)))))))), wa(wa(wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wex(hs5, wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs4), cop(cv(hs5), cv(hs2)))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3)))))
  pm4.71rd(wrel(c0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3))), wa(wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wex(hs5, wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs4), cop(cv(hs5), cv(hs2)))))))
  adantrd(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0)), wbr(cv(hs4), ctxp(c1st, ccom(cdif(universe, cid), c2nd)), cv(hs3)), wa(wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wex(hs5, wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs4), cop(cv(hs5), cv(hs2)))))))
  anim12d(wrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs4), c0), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wex(hs5, wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs4), cop(cv(hs5), cv(hs2))))))

blocks.name: brsingle
blocks.content: The binary relation form of the singleton function. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm brsingle(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, csingle, c1), wceq(c1, csn(c0)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  brtxpsd3(hs0, c0, csingle, c1, csn(c0), cxp(universe, universe), cid)
  df-singleton()
  mpbir2an(wbr(c0, cxp(universe, universe), c1), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  brxp(c0, universe, universe, c1)
  bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  ideq(cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cid)
}

thm brsingle(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[Singleton]c1 ↔ c1 = { c0 })

} = {
  brtxpsd3(hs0, c0, csingle, c1, { c0 }, (𝕌 × 𝕌), cid)

  bitr4i(hs0 ∈ { c0 }, hs0[=]c0, hs0 = c0)
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  ideq(hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
  diff.hs0.c(cid)
}

blocks.name: elsingles
blocks.content: Membership in the class of all singletons. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm elsingles(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, csingles), wex(s0, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, csingles), wex(s0, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, csingles)
  exlimiv(s0, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), universe))
  snex(cv(s0))
  eleq1(c0, csn(cv(s0)), universe)
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, universe, wcel(c0, csingles), wex(s0, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), csingles), wex(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, csingles)
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), csingles), wex(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(csingle)), wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), csingle, cv(hs0))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), csingles, crn(csingle))
  df-singles()
  elrn(s0, cv(hs0), csingle)
  exbii(s0, wbr(cv(s0), csingle, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))
  brsingle(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  vex(s0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, csingles))
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.csingle.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fnsingle
blocks.content: The singleton relationship is a function over the universe. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnsingle() {
  |- wfn(csingle, universe)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wfn(csingle, universe), wfun(csingle), wceq(cdm(csingle), universe))
  mpbir2an(wfun(csingle), wrel(csingle), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  mpbir(wrel(csingle), wrel(cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(cid, universe))))))
  mpbir(wrel(cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(cid, universe))))), wss(cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(cid, universe)))), cxp(universe, universe)))
  difss(cxp(universe, universe), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(cid, universe))))
  df-rel(cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(cid, universe)))))
  releqi(csingle, cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(cid, universe)))))
  df-singleton()
  gen2(hs0, hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  ax-gen(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  syl2anb(wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs2), csn(cv(hs0))))
  brsingle(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  brsingle(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  vex(hs2)
  eqtr3(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0)), cv(hs2))
  dffun2(hs0, hs1, hs2, csingle)
  mpgbir(hs0, wceq(cdm(csingle), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(csingle)))
  eqv(hs0, cdm(csingle))
  mpbir(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(csingle)), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs1))))
  ax-mp(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, csn(cv(hs0))))
  mpbir(wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqid(csn(cv(hs0)))
  brsingle(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs0)))
  spcev(hs1, csn(cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, csn(cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, cv(hs1)))
  snex(cv(hs0))
  breq2(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), csingle)
  eldm(hs1, cv(hs0), csingle)
  vex(hs0)
  df-fn(csingle, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(csingle)
  diff.hs1.c(csingle)
  diff.hs2.c(csingle)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(csingle))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, csn(cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

blocks.name: fvsingle
blocks.content: The value of the singleton function. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Scott Fenton, 13-Apr-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvsingle(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(csingle, c0), csn(c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(csingle, c0), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wceq(cfv(csingle, c0), csn(c0)), wceq(cfv(csingle, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(csingle, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(csingle, c0), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, csingle)
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  mpbir(wceq(cfv(csingle, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, csn(cv(hs0))))
  mpbir(wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqid(csn(cv(hs0)))
  brsingle(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs0)))
  snex(cv(hs0))
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cfv(csingle, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), csingle, csn(cv(hs0)))), wfn(csingle, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  fnsingle()
  vex(hs0)
  fnbrfvb(csingle, universe, cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs0)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(csingle, c0), csn(c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, csingle)
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(csingle, c0), csn(c0)))
}

  fnsingle()
  vex(hs0)
  fnbrfvb(csingle, universe, hs0, { hs0 })
  eqtr4d((Singleton ` c0), { c0 }, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c0, csingle)
  biimpi(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, { c0 } = ∅)
  snprc(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((Singleton ` c0)= { c0 })
}

blocks.name: dfsingles2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the class of all singletons. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 20-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: snelsingles
blocks.content: A singleton is a member of the class of all singletons. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm snelsingles(class c0) {
  |- wcel(csn(c0), csingles)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
} = {
  mpbir(wcel(csn(c0), csingles), wex(hs0, wceq(csn(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  eximii(hs0, wceq(csn(c0), csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)))
  mpbi(wex(hs0, wceq(c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  bitri(wcel(c0, universe), wex(hs0, wceq(c0, cv(hs0))), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  isset(hs0, c0)
  exbii(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), c0)
  sneq(c0, cv(hs0))
  elsingles(hs0, csn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm snelsingles(class c0) {
  ⊢ { c0 } ∈ Singletons
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  mpbir({ c0 } ∈ Singletons, ∃(hs0, { c0 } = { hs0 }))
  eximii(hs0, { c0 } = { hs0 }, c0 = hs0)
  mpbi(∃(hs0, c0 = hs0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  bitri(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs0, c0 = hs0), ∃(hs0, hs0 = c0))
  isset(hs0, c0)
  exbii(hs0, hs0 = c0, c0 = hs0)
  eqcom(hs0, c0)
  sneq(c0, hs0)
  elsingles(hs0, { c0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
}

  3bitr4i(wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))))), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))))))
  exdistr(hs1, hs2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  bitri(wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0))), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))))), wex(hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))))))
  bitr3i(wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0))), wex(hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))))), wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs2))))))
  ceqsexv(hs2, cv(hs0), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  vex(hs0)
  eqeq2d(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs2)), csn(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))
  sneq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))
  exbii(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))))
  bitr3i(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))), wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  ceqsexv(hs1, csn(cv(hs2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs2)))))

  excom(hs2, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))))

  eqtri(cin(csn(cab(s0, w0)), csingles), cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))), cin(cab(hs1, wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0))), cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))))
  ineq12i(csn(cab(s0, w0)), csingles, cab(hs1, wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0))), cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))))
  df-sn(hs1, cab(s0, w0))
  dfsingles2(hs1, hs2)
  eqtri(cin(cab(hs1, wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0))), cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))), cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))), cab(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))))
  inab(hs1, wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  abbii(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))), wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))))
  bicomi(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))), wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))))
  19.42v(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), cab(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

thm dfiota3(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ iota(s0, w0)= ⋃ ⋃({ { s0 | w0 } } ⋂ Singletons)
} = {
  eqtri(iota(s0, w0), ⋃ ⋃({ { s0 | w0 } } ⋂ Singletons), ⋃ { hs0 | { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 } })
  df-iota(s0, hs0, w0)
  unieqi({ hs0 | { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 } }, ⋃({ { s0 | w0 } } ⋂ Singletons))
  eqtr4i({ hs0 | { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 } }, ⋃({ { s0 | w0 } } ⋂ Singletons), ⋃ { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))})
  mpgbir(hs0, { hs0 | { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 } } = ⋃ { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))}, ({ s0 | w0 } = { hs0 } ↔ hs0 ∈ ⋃ { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))}))
  abeq1(hs0, ⋃ { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))}, { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  3bitr4i({ s0 | w0 } = { hs0 }, hs0 ∈ ⋃ { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))}, ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))), ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))))
  exdistr(hs1, hs2, hs0 ∈ hs1, (hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))
  bitri({ s0 | w0 } = { hs0 }, ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))), ∃(hs2, ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))))
  bitr3i({ s0 | w0 } = { hs0 }, ∃(hs2, ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))), ∃(hs2,(hs2 = hs0 ∧ { s0 | w0 } = { hs2 })))
  ceqsexv(hs2, hs0, { s0 | w0 } = { hs2 }, { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  vex(hs0)
  eqeq2d({ s0 | w0 }, { hs2 }, { hs0 }, hs2 = hs0)
  sneq(hs2, hs0)
  exbii(hs2, (hs2 = hs0 ∧ { s0 | w0 } = { hs2 }), ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))))
  bitr3i((hs2 = hs0 ∧ { s0 | w0 } = { hs2 }), ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))), ∃(hs1,(hs1 = { hs2 } ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1))))
  ceqsexv(hs1, { hs2 }, (hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1), (hs2 = hs0 ∧ { s0 | w0 } = { hs2 }))
  snex(hs2)
  syl6bb(hs1 = { hs2 }, (hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1), (hs2 = hs0 ∧ { s0 | w0 } = { hs2 }), ({ hs2 } = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs0 ∈ { hs2 }))
  anbi12d(hs1 = { hs2 }, hs1 = { s0 | w0 }, hs0 ∈ hs1, { hs2 } = { s0 | w0 }, hs0 ∈ { hs2 })
  eqeq1(hs1, { hs2 }, { s0 | w0 })
  eleq2(hs1, { hs2 }, hs0)
  anbi12ci({ hs2 } = { s0 | w0 }, hs0 ∈ { hs2 }, hs2 = hs0, { s0 | w0 } = { hs2 })
  eqcom({ hs2 }, { s0 | w0 })
  bitri(hs0 ∈ { hs2 }, hs2 = hs0, hs0 = hs2)
  velsn(hs0, hs2)
  equcom(hs0, hs2)
  exbii(hs1, (hs1 = { hs2 } ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1)), (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))
  an13(hs1 = { hs2 }, hs1 = { s0 | w0 }, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  excom(hs2, hs1, (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))
  eluniab(hs1, hs0, ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))
  unieqi(({ { s0 | w0 } } ⋂ Singletons), { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))})
  eqtri(({ { s0 | w0 } } ⋂ Singletons), { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))}, ({ hs1 | hs1 = { s0 | w0 } } ⋂ { hs1 | ∃(hs2, hs1 = { hs2 })}))
  ineq12i({ { s0 | w0 } }, csingles, { hs1 | hs1 = { s0 | w0 } }, { hs1 | ∃(hs2, hs1 = { hs2 })})
  df-sn(hs1, { s0 | w0 })
  dfsingles2(hs1, hs2)
  eqtri(({ hs1 | hs1 = { s0 | w0 } } ⋂ { hs1 | ∃(hs2, hs1 = { hs2 })}), { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))}, { hs1 |(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ ∃(hs2, hs1 = { hs2 }))})
  inab(hs1, hs1 = { s0 | w0 }, ∃(hs2, hs1 = { hs2 }))
  abbii(hs1, (hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ ∃(hs2, hs1 = { hs2 })), ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))
  bicomi((hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ ∃(hs2, hs1 = { hs2 })), ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 })))
  19.42v(hs2, hs1 = { s0 | w0 }, hs1 = { hs2 })
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 = { s0 | w0 } ∧ hs1 = { hs2 }))})
  diff.hs2.w(hs0 ∈ hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.w({ s0 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  diff.hs1.c({ hs2 })
  diff.hs1.w((hs2 = hs0 ∧ { s0 | w0 } = { hs2 }))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 | w0 })
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.w(hs1 = { s0 | w0 })
}

blocks.name: dffv5
blocks.content: Another quantifier free definition of function value. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffv5(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cuni(cin(csn(cima(c0, csn(c1))), csingles))))
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cuni(cin(csn(cima(c0, csn(c1))), csingles))), cio(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), cuni(cuni(cin(csn(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1))))), csingles))))
  dffv3(hs0, c0, c1)
  dfiota3(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  unieqi(cuni(cin(csn(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1))))), csingles)), cuni(cin(csn(cima(c0, csn(c1))), csingles)))
  unieqi(cin(csn(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1))))), csingles), cin(csn(cima(c0, csn(c1))), csingles))
  ineq1i(csn(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1))))), csingles, csn(cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  sneqi(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  abid2(hs0, cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, csn(c1)))
}

thm dffv5(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` c1)= ⋃ ⋃({(c0 " { c1 })} ⋂ Singletons)
} = {
  3eqtri((c0 ` c1), ⋃ ⋃({(c0 " { c1 })} ⋂ Singletons), iota(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })), ⋃ ⋃({ { hs0 | hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })} } ⋂ Singletons))

  unieqi(({ { hs0 | hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })} } ⋂ Singletons), ({(c0 " { c1 })} ⋂ Singletons))
  ineq1i({ { hs0 | hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })} }, csingles, {(c0 " { c1 })})
  sneqi({ hs0 | hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })}, (c0 " { c1 }))
  abid2(hs0, (c0 " { c1 }))

blocks.name: unisnif
blocks.content: Express union of singleton in terms of ` if ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm unisnif(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cuni(csn(c0)), cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, universe)))
} = {
  eqcomi(cuni(csn(c0)), cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, universe)))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, universe)), cuni(csn(c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  eqtr4d(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, universe)), cuni(csn(c0)), c0, wcel(c0, universe))
  iftrue(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, universe))
  unisng(c0, universe)
  eqtr4d(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, universe)), cuni(csn(c0)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  iffalse(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, universe))
  syl6eq(cuni(csn(c0)), emptycls, cuni(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  unieqd(csn(c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  uni0()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm unisnif(class c0) {
  ⊢ ⋃ { c0 } = if(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0, ∅)

  exbii(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c2nd), cop(c0, c1))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  anbi12ci(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c2nd), cop(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  epel(hs1, cv(hs0))

  brcnv(cv(hs1), c2nd, cop(c0, c1))
  vex(hs1)

  brco(hs1, cv(hs0), ccnv(c2nd), cep, cop(c0, c1))
  vex(hs0)

blocks.name: brfullfun
blocks.content: A binary relation form condition for the full function. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm brfullfun(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cfullfn(c1), c2), wceq(c2, cfv(c1, c0)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wbr(c0, cfullfn(c1), c2), wceq(c2, cfv(c1, c0))), wcel(c2, universe))
  3bitr3i(wbr(c0, cfullfn(c1), c2), wceq(c2, cfv(c1, c0)), wceq(cfv(cfullfn(c1), c0), c2), wceq(c2, cfv(cfullfn(c1), c0)))
  eqcom(cfv(cfullfn(c1), c0), c2)
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cfv(cfullfn(c1), c0), c2), wbr(c0, cfullfn(c1), c2)), wfn(cfullfn(c1), universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  fullfunfnv(c1)
  fnbrfvb(cfullfn(c1), universe, c0, c2)
  eqeq2i(c2, cfv(cfullfn(c1), c0), cfv(c1, c0))
  fullfunfv(c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brfullfun(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[FullFun(c1)]c2 ↔ c2 =(c1 ` c0))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  a1ii((c0[FullFun(c1)]c2 ↔ c2 =(c1 ` c0)), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  3bitr3i(c0[FullFun(c1)]c2, c2 =(c1 ` c0), (FullFun(c1)` c0)= c2, c2 =(FullFun(c1)` c0))
  eqcom((FullFun(c1)` c0), c2)
  mp2an(((FullFun(c1)` c0)= c2 ↔ c0[FullFun(c1)]c2), FullFun(c1)[Fn]𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fullfunfnv(c1)
  fnbrfvb(FullFun(c1), universe, c0, c2)
  eqeq2i(c2, (FullFun(c1)` c0), (c1 ` c0))
  fullfunfv(c1, c0)
}

thm dfrdg4(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(crdg(c0, c1), cuni(cdif(cin(cfuns, cima(ccnv(cdomain), con0)), cdm(cdif(ccom(ccnv(cep), cdomain), cfix(ccom(ccnv(capply), cun(cxp(cxp(universe, csn(emptycls)), csn(cuni(csn(c1)))), cun(cres(ccom(cbigcup, cimg), cxp(universe, climits)), cres(ccom(cfullfn(c0), ccom(capply, cpprod(cid, cbigcup))), cxp(universe, crn(csuccf))))))))))))
} = {
  eqtr4i(crdg(c0, c1), cuni(cdif(cin(cfuns, cima(ccnv(cdomain), con0)), cdm(cdif(ccom(ccnv(cep), cdomain), cfix(ccom(ccnv(capply), cun(cxp(cxp(universe, csn(emptycls)), csn(cuni(csn(c1)))), cun(cres(ccom(cbigcup, cimg), cxp(universe, climits)), cres(ccom(cfullfn(c0), ccom(capply, cpprod(cid, cbigcup))), cxp(universe, crn(csuccf))))))))))), cuni(cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, con0, wa(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cif(cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, universe)), cif(cuni(cima(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs2)))), wlim(cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs2), emptycls)))))))))
  dfrdg3(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1)

thm dfint3(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cint(c0), cdif(universe, cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0)))
} = {
  eqtr4i(cint(c0), cdif(universe, cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0)), cab(hs0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  dfint2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  abbi2i(hs0, cdif(universe, cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0)), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  3bitr4ri(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0))), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), cv(hs0)))), wn(wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), cv(hs0)))))
  ralnex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), cv(hs0)))
  ralbii(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), cv(hs0))))
  bitr2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)))
  con1bii(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)))
  bitr2i(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs1)))
  brcnv(cv(hs1), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs1)
  mpbiran(wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cep), cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), universe, cv(hs1)))
  brv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  brdif(cv(hs0), universe, cep, cv(hs1))
  epel(hs1, cv(hs0))
  xchbinx(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0))), wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0)))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  eldif(cv(hs0), universe, cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0))
  elima(hs1, cv(hs0), ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(universe, cima(ccnv(cdif(universe, cep)), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))

}

  rspcev(hs2, hs1, hs0, hs1 ⊆ hs1, hs1 ⊆ hs2)
  sseq2(hs2, hs1, hs1)
  bitri(hs1 ∈(`' SSet " hs0), ∃(hs2 ∈ hs0, hs1 ⊆ hs2), ∃(hs2 ∈ hs0, hs2[`' SSet]hs1))
  elima(hs2, hs1, `' SSet, hs0)
  rexbii(hs2, hs0, hs2[`' SSet]hs1, hs1 ⊆ hs2)
  bitri(hs2[`' SSet]hs1, hs1 ⊆ hs2, hs1[SSet]hs2)
  brcnv(hs2, csset, hs1)
  brsset(hs1, hs2)
  vex(hs2)
  sseq2(hs1, (`' SSet " hs0), hs0)
  bitr3i(hs1 =(`' SSet " hs0), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ Image(`' SSet), hs0[Image(`' SSet)]hs1)
  brimage(hs0, `' SSet, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  df-br(hs0, Image(`' SSet), hs1)
  bitr3i(hs0 ⊆ hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ SSet, hs0[SSet]hs1)
  brsset(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  df-br(hs0, csset, hs1)
  mp2b((Image(`' SSet)⊆ SSet ↔ ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ Image(`' SSet)→ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ SSet)))), Fun(Image(`' SSet)), Rel(Image(`' SSet)))
  funimage(`' SSet)
  funrel(Image(`' SSet))
  ssrel(hs0, hs1, Image(`' SSet), csset)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((`' SSet " hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.w(hs1 ⊆ hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(`' SSet)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(Image(`' SSet))
  diff.hs0.c(csset)
  diff.hs1.c(Image(`' SSet))
  diff.hs1.c(csset)
}

blocks.name: brub
blocks.content: Binary relation form of the upper bound functor. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm brub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cub(c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wbr(c0, cub(c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cdif(cxp(universe, universe), ccom(cdif(universe, c1), ccnv(cep))), c2), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cdif(universe, c1), c2))))
  xchbinx(wbr(c0, cdif(cxp(universe, universe), ccom(cdif(universe, c1), ccnv(cep))), c2), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cdif(universe, c1), c2)), wbr(c0, ccom(cdif(universe, c1), ccnv(cep)), c2))
  mpbiran(wbr(c0, cdif(cxp(universe, universe), ccom(cdif(universe, c1), ccnv(cep))), c2), wn(wbr(c0, ccom(cdif(universe, c1), ccnv(cep)), c2)), wbr(c0, cxp(universe, universe), c2))
  mpbir2an(wbr(c0, cxp(universe, universe), c2), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  brxp(c0, universe, universe, c2)
  brdif(c0, cxp(universe, universe), ccom(cdif(universe, c1), ccnv(cep)), c2)
  coepr(s0, c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2)
  breqi(c0, cub(c1), c2, cdif(cxp(universe, universe), ccom(cdif(universe, c1), ccnv(cep))))
  df-ub(c1)
  con2bii(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cdif(universe, c1), c2)))
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cdif(universe, c1), c2)), wn(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cdif(universe, c1), c2), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)))
  mpbiran(wbr(cv(s0), cdif(universe, c1), c2), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), universe, c2))
  brv(cv(s0), c2)
  brdif(cv(s0), universe, c1, c2)
  rexnal(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, universe, c1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[UB(c1)]c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0[c1]c2))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0[UB(c1)]c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0[c1]c2), c0[((𝕌 × 𝕌)\((𝕌 \ c1)∘ `' ∈))]c2, ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0[(𝕌 \ c1)]c2))
  xchbinx(c0[((𝕌 × 𝕌)\((𝕌 \ c1)∘ `' ∈))]c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0[(𝕌 \ c1)]c2), c0[((𝕌 \ c1)∘ `' ∈)]c2)
  mpbiran(c0[((𝕌 × 𝕌)\((𝕌 \ c1)∘ `' ∈))]c2, ¬ c0[((𝕌 \ c1)∘ `' ∈)]c2, c0[(𝕌 × 𝕌)]c2)
  mpbir2an(c0[(𝕌 × 𝕌)]c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  brxp(c0, universe, universe, c2)
  brdif(c0, (𝕌 × 𝕌), ((𝕌 \ c1)∘ `' ∈), c2)
  coepr(s0, c0, (𝕌 \ c1), c2)
  breqi(c0, UB(c1), c2, ((𝕌 × 𝕌)\((𝕌 \ c1)∘ `' ∈)))
  df-ub(c1)
  con2bii(∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0[c1]c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0[(𝕌 \ c1)]c2))
  bitri(∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0[(𝕌 \ c1)]c2), ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0[c1]c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ s0[c1]c2))
  rexbii(s0, c0, s0[(𝕌 \ c1)]c2, ¬ s0[c1]c2)
  mpbiran(s0[(𝕌 \ c1)]c2, ¬ s0[c1]c2, s0[𝕌]c2)
  brv(s0, c2)
  brdif(s0, universe, c1, c2)
  rexnal(s0, c0, s0[c1]c2)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, universe, c1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: brlb
blocks.content: Binary relation form of the lower bound functor. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm brlb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, clb(c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c2, c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(wbr(c0, clb(c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c2, c1, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cub(ccnv(c1)), c2), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c1), c2)))
  breqi(c0, clb(c1), c2, cub(ccnv(c1)))
  df-lb(c1)
  brub(s0, c0, ccnv(c1), c2)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c1, c2)
  vex(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brlb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[LB(c1)]c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2[c1]s0))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(c0[LB(c1)]c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2[c1]s0), c0[UB(`' c1)]c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0[`' c1]c2))
  breqi(c0, LB(c1), c2, UB(`' c1))
  df-lb(c1)
  brub(s0, c0, `' c1, c2)
  ralbii(s0, c0, s0[`' c1]c2, c2[c1]s0)
  brcnv(s0, c1, c2)
  vex(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c1)
}
